original_text: The whole Israelite army was ready to fight. Most of them were with their tents on the north side of the city. The other soldiers were hiding on the west side of the city. That night Joshua went down into the valley.
korean_text: 이와 같이 성읍 북쪽에는 온 군대가 있고 성읍 서쪽에는 복병이 있었더라 여호수아가 그 밤에 골짜기 가운데로 들어가니

sentences.original_text: The whole Israelite army was ready to fight
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 군대 전체가 전투 준비를 마쳤다

sentences.original_text: Most of them were with their tents
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 대부분은 자신들의 천막과 함께 있었다

sentences.original_text: on the north side of the city
on the west side of the city
